resources.string: Currently only support 7 days of food diary. More features are on the way…
去百度手机助手写评价
去华为应用市场写评价
Rate us on Amazon App Store
Currently working on publishing the apps to stores…
"MealPrint is large part a project by @AnnabelleZ, a student at University of Washington, to learn a little bit about Android Studio and mobile developing techniques.\n\n

MealPrint is a food diary app allows you to keep a photo record of what you eat for the last 7 days! Features:
 	- Taking photos of your meals or import from gallery
 	- Track the time of when you have each meal
 	- Note section for each meal
 	- Supports 7 days of records
 	- Sharing function that automatically makes a collage of your one-day meals, ready for you to share with you friends
 	- Supports English, Chinese (Simplified), Chinese (Traditional), and Korean


Why using MealPrint?
 	- A reminder for you to get away from irregular eating habits
 	- Visually pleasing to look at
 	- Simpler to use than regular text-based memo
 	- Make eating more fun
Are you sure you want to remove this meal?
